name: Falling Far
description:
This was initially going to be a game created in one hour for the zero hour game jam... but I didn't realize that the daylight saving time for my time zone was different than that of the actual jam. Whoops!

Despite this not being an entry for the actual jam, I thought it would still be fun to try and make a game in one hour with the theme used for the actual zero hour game jam during my time zone's time switch anyways. The theme for the aforementioned jam was "gravity."

"Falling Far" is an extremely short Bitsy game and doesn't have much to it, but it was created in under one hour! Knowing that, I hope you enjoy, and as always thanks for playing!
